attributes.action: Stop trying to control the Financial Activities of the City.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government has done more damage to the profitability of GB incorporated than any other Government. If we lose the trust of the financial institutions because of Government interference the country as a whole will be the poorer for it. The tax on NON DOMS must not be implemented as it would just be the thin edge of the government wedge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
